name: Bob's House
description:
Bob's house disappeared! Bob went to look for missing pieces, but now he's lost too! Help Bob by finding a missing piece for him!

There are a total of 20 pieces, but each person can only find one. We will have to work together to find all of the pieces.

*Note*: The browser should only show you one piece. Reloading will bring up the same piece you got before. This can be circumvented, but it isn't intended.
